entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:30 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 11:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: WSW 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 60 gusting to 80 early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind becoming south 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
